name: REDESIGN
description:
This Game Is Made for GMTKGAME JAM , THEME:JOINT TOGETHER

IN THE GAME GAME YOU PLAY AS A MOUSE WHICH IS TRYING TO GET TO THE FINISH LIKE WHICH IS A "NEXT Button at the end". the levels stage are missed place so you have to redesign and joint stage together to make a path to the finish. there are 5 levels since there was no much time. this was the first that came to my mide when i heard the theme so most of the stuff is really random? like i don't know why the player is a mouse at all. There is alot of bug that i could not fix. And Some Bugs Make the game more hard so i kept it tho.  One of the bugs is that you camera change every time you touch somthing

How to Play:

W,A,S,D TO MOVE

R TO RESTART

EXC TO RETURN TO MEANUE 

GAME,ART,MUSIC BY ME

And Yea I Copy and Paste this instruction from the game because I was lazy and didn't wanted to type every thing again
